name: POLICE RUSH
description:
A Unity Game college project.

A and D To move character

Space To Jump

P to Pause

Kumpulkan 100 point flag untuk memenangkan permainan 

Awas hati hati dengan obataclenya.

Collect 100 flag points to win the game
Beware of caution with obstacles.

TelkomUniversity 2019.
